dialogue_piece.speaker: patient
dialogue_piece.message: 听着不错，就是我老是忘记，没个固定时间，家里也没人提醒。

dialogue_piece.speaker: system

dialogue_piece.speaker: patient
dialogue_piece.message: 跟孩子说说倒是没试过，怕他们烦。

dialogue_piece.speaker: system

dialogue_piece.speaker: system
